title: Umm
body: Can someone please tell me that you can expand your client window the good ol' fashion way of getting the mouse, finding the arrow, and pulling it out, instead of having a goddamn 1024x868 thing pop up (playing on a mac).

replies.body: You can change the resolution of the client but only to presets not with a click and drag, but if you want to make it smaller you'll find it in settings.

So under window size you only see one option? If that res is small it seems you have a retina display or? My guess would be the client is detecting that as the best you can do with the hardware you have, but since your display is such a high res it's causing issues. I believe there is a way to manually change the resolution in the client files but I'll chase it up for you.

thanks, it's gone back to it's normal size, but it was really bugging me!

It seemed to be like 640x320, now it's back to normal, tyvm for responding to my post!
